price: 44. Malcina Qaran kee malcina baaxooy, ken nammayih fanal ginok eneyyi ittam kaa saytunnossa, Ginok tu matan Yalla faylisak kaa saytunnossam tani tet akke waytek, kinnih immay sinaamey usun kaat aban saytunnoysiyya mataabbaanaay edde maraddan, diggah Yalli xiqli dambi cabti li kinni.
arabic: تُسَبِّحُ لَهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ ٱلسَّبۡعُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّۚ وَإِن مِّن شَيۡءٍ إِلَّا يُسَبِّحُ بِحَمۡدِهِۦ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تَفۡقَهُونَ تَسۡبِيحَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: tusabbiḥu lahu al-samāwātu al-sabʿu wal-arḍu waman fīhinna wa-in min shayin illā yusabbiḥu biḥamdihi walākin lā tafqahūna tasbīḥahum innahu kāna ḥalīman ghafūran
